name: RICO
description: Two cops, one case and only 24 hours to bust the bad guys! Become a loose cannon police detective and face off with criminal gangs in this procedurally-generated action movie FPS. Join forces with a friend and take down those crooks, buddy-cop style!
minimum_requirements: Минимальные: ОС: Window 8.1 Процессор: Intel Core i5-4590 Оперативная память: 4 GB ОЗУ Видеокарта: GeForce GTX 760 (2048 MB Ram) DirectX: Версии 10 Место на диске: 8 GB
